       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  MAGNARELLI  -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in  relation  to  the  Syracuse  city
         school district

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 12 of section 3602 of  the  education  law,  as
    2  added  by  section  19  of part B of chapter 57 of the laws of 2008, the
    3  closing paragraph as added by section 18 of part A of chapter 57 of  the
    4  laws of 2009, is amended to read as follows:
    5    12. Academic enhancement aid. A school district that as of April first
    6  of  the base year has been continuously identified as a district in need
    7  of improvement for at least five  years  shall,  for  the  two  thousand
    8  eight--two  thousand  nine  school  year,  be  entitled to an additional
    9  apportionment equal to the positive remainder, if any, of (a) the lesser
   10  of fifteen million dollars or the product of the  total  foundation  aid
   11  base,  as  defined  by  paragraph  j of subdivision one of this section,
   12  multiplied by ten percent (0.10), less (b) the positive remainder of (i)
   13  the sum of the total foundation aid apportioned pursuant to  subdivision
   14  four of this section and the supplemental educational improvement grants
   15  apportioned  pursuant to subdivision eight of section thirty-six hundred
   16  forty-one of this [act] ARTICLE, less  (ii)  the  total  foundation  aid
   17  base.
   18    For the two thousand nine--two thousand ten [and] THROUGH two thousand
   19  [ten]  TWELVE--two  thousand [eleven] THIRTEEN school years, each school
   20  district shall be entitled to an apportionment equal to the  amount  set
   21  forth  for such school district as "EDUCATION GRANTS, ACADEMIC EN" under
   22  the heading "2008-09 BASE YEAR AIDS" in the school aid computer  listing
   23  produced  by the commissioner in support of the budget for the two thou-
   24  sand nine--two thousand ten school year and entitled "SA0910", and  such

    1  apportionment shall be deemed to satisfy the state obligation to provide
    2  an  apportionment  pursuant  to  subdivision eight of section thirty-six
    3  hundred forty-one of this article. THE  SYRACUSE  CITY  SCHOOL  DISTRICT
    4  SHALL  ALSO  BE  ENTITLED  TO  AN  AMOUNT  EQUIVALENT  TO THE PERCENTAGE
    5  INCREASE, CARRIED TO FOUR DECIMALS, IN THE SYRACUSE CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT
    6  PUBLIC ENROLLMENT PURSUANT TO FOUNDATION AID UNDER SUBDIVISION  FOUR  OF
    7  THIS  SECTION FROM THE TWO THOUSAND EIGHT--TWO THOUSAND NINE SCHOOL YEAR
    8  TO THE TWO THOUSAND NINE--TWO THOUSAND TEN SCHOOL YEAR MULTIPLIED BY THE
    9  DISTRICT'S FOUNDATION AID AMOUNT. SUCH INCREASE SHALL NOT BE SUBJECT  TO
   10  SECTION TWO HUNDRED ELEVEN-D OF THIS CHAPTER.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect July 1, 2011.
